answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Hello Laura,
San Jose's Department of Parks and Recreation enlisted the help of a qualified expert to determine ways to enhance revenue. http:icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/301063
The Knowledge Network features the Municipal Management Manual for Afghanistan, which includes several tips for revenue enhancement. http://icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303494
I hope this helps to answer your question. Please let us know if you need more help.
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Laura Moore
text: We are preparing an RFP, to obtain the services of a consultant company for revenue enhancement services relating to sales and use tax, liquor, tax and franshise fees and lodging taxes and fees.   We are looking for ways to more effectively resolve taxpayer compliance and customer service issues and recover unpaid or underreported tax revenue.  If your city has embarked on such a project, could you share stories, results.  If there are any examples of RFP's or contact names, that would be greatly appreciated.
title: Tax Revenue Enhancement and Data Warehousing
